Indemnity

By using this site you agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless the web site, its officers, directors, employees and agents, from any claims, actions or demands, including without limitation reasonable legal and accounting fees, alleging or resulting from your use of the material or your breach of the terms of this agreement.
title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
